msg.msgText: The topic cannot be used because it is a system topic.

msgExplanation.p: Topic names starting with $SYS are system topics. System topics can only be published by the Message Gateway server. You are not allowed to create a durable subscription to system topics.

msgUserResponse.p: If you do not mean to use a system topic, then use a topic name that does not start with $SYS. If you are subscribing to a system topic, you must not use a durable subscription. In MQTT you must subscribe to a system topic in a connection created with cleansession=1.
